title: Got my mother and 2 younger brothers playing LoL
body:
free referrals ^w^

(I have no friends, all my friends play League of Legends already)

replies.body: Yes! Now your mum can learn that you can't pause!
maybe i should try to get my mum to play so she can't understand that online games cannot be paused =/(unless it's a custom game)
your mums not gonna let you play league after she meets toxic people lmao.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zOiGVdb9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-16T02:29:02.515+0000)
>
> your mums not gonna let you play league after she meets toxic people lmao.

AHAHAH true.

Op might have screwed himself xd

This...is so true.

Take a upvote.
This is great. Now you can tell your mum to cook dinner just as she starts a ranked game!
"No I can't pause this you kno..... Oh. Oh how I've been wrong my child."

My mum understands what I mean when I say "I'm in a match" so it's all good.

But yeah what goldentomato said, so true.
can't wait til your mum complains about "elo hell" and "fukin noobs" 8)
